entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse @SteveFDA Wow, you wouldn’t even say that Trump was wrong, when he said 99% of Covid-19 cases are harmless! I thought you’re supposed to do no harm, yet you’re too chickenshit to say that is a false statement! That’s wrong, and you will be remembered for not correcting! Good Luck America!
